org.interpss.numeric.sparse
Interface SparseEqnMatrix2x2

All Superinterfaces:
SparseEqnObject<Matrix_xy,Vector_xy>, SparseEquation
All Known Implementing Classes:
SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2NativeImpl
public interface SparseEqnMatrix2x2
extends SparseEqnObject<Matrix_xy,Vector_xy>

Sparse Equation of data type 2x2 matrix for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1
